title: TetroCrate 3D for Android Wear
summary: A great little time waster on your wrist.
description: Enjoy the three-dimensional TetroCrate challenge on your smartwatch. Despite its small size the gameplay remains just as fun and addictive as on your phone or tablet. The rules are similar to the phone version:● Move the blocks over the board to find the best placement and keep the board from filling up.● Rotate the blocks to facilitate their placement.● Tap to fit a block into a suitable empty space. ● Completed lines will disappear from the board shifting the remaining pieces towards the centre.● Try completing multiple lines and earn higher scores.● Play at your own pace.Enjoyed best● at boring meetings● to kill time at work● waiting for a bus/ an appointmentWhy we love it● a quick download● battery-friendly● ad-free
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy the three-dimensional TetroCrate challenge on your smartwatch. Despite its small size the gameplay remains just as fun and addictive as on your phone or tablet.

The rules are similar to the phone version:
● Move the blocks over the board to find the best placement and keep the board from filling up.
● Rotate the blocks to facilitate their placement.
● Tap to fit a block into a suitable empty space.
● Completed lines will disappear from the board shifting the remaining pieces towards the centre.
● Try completing multiple lines and earn higher scores.
● Play at your own pace.

Enjoyed best
● at boring meetings
● to kill time at work
● waiting for a bus/ an appointment

Why we love it
● a quick download
● battery-friendly
● ad-free
comments: A good and solid game, BUT... ... Get rid of the plus shaped blocks. It doesn't matter how good you are or how good you're doing, the plus shaped blocks will abruptly end your game, even if you still had so much opportunity to go on. The plus block requires way too much space, and unless you're at the start of true game, it's a death sentence for your hand to have it appear at ANY time after the start.

Well made,  but weak execution Really not a bad idea,  and visually one of the better Android Wear games out there,  but please,  change to standard block shapes instead of the ridiculous shaped currently used.
Best game! Hands down my favorite game for android wear, helps get me through those boring meetings!
Fun little game! Great way to waste some time and a bit more difficult than it looks! So much fun!
I'm addicted. Always fun to pass the time. Sony Smartwatch 3
Best game on Android Wear Great way to waste time on your watch. An original twist to Tetris.
recentChanges: - Rebuild with the latest SDK to fix potential incompatibilities
- Smaller apk size - only 331K, and wear app - 124k
